title: Trump says China, others can't have Nvidia top AI chips
description: Artificial intelligence giant Nvidia's most advanced chips will be reserved for US companies and kept out of China and other countries, US President Donald Trump said.
content:
Artificial intelligence giant Nvidia's most advanced chips will be reserved for US companies and kept out of China and other countries, US President Donald Trump said.

title: Microsoft AI chief says only humans can feel, calls AI consciousness a wrong question to ask

title: Washington's Mineral Trade Initiative and AI Ambitions
description: U.S. Interior Secretary Doug Burgum announced at the ADIPEC energy conference that Washington has established a club for nations to facilitate trade in refining and processing critical minerals. He also highlighted the U.S.'s commitment to securing sufficient power to excel in the artificial intelligence race.
